reviewText: on the step kung fu workout, would it really have been that difficult to have hung the sign with the chinese character "fu" on it RIGHT SIDE UP?? geez, i'm not even chinese and i find this offensively stupid. i hope no one has gotten a tattoo based on their workout video...

Where's the Kung Fu? Even her husband in the back can't even do a simple kick w/o falling over! There is almost no kung fu instruction or practice whatsoever, maybe literally 2 minutes. The rest is basic boring 90s step aerobics.
